title: Save up to $150 on cheap 4K TV deals in Best Buy's latest 4-day sale
author: alex-whitelock
summary: There are TV deals for a range of sizes and budgets today
article: Best Buy, one of the best retailers for snagging cheap TV deals, has just launched a new 4-day sale that has a couple of excellent choices for those looking for a display on a budget.
Prices start at just $99 over at Best Buy's new sale; however, we've picked out a few choice TV deals to consider just down below which we think are especially good value right now.

Our recommendations kick off with this Hisense H55 Series for just $199.99 (was $229.99). This one isn't 4K, like the other displays on our list, but at 40-inches it's the perfect size if you've got major space constraints at home. It's also pretty feature-packed for just $199, featuring Google Assistant, 120 Motion Rate, and DTS Studio Sound as well.

For something a little bigger, we recommend the 55-inch TCL 4-Series for $319.99 and the 65-inch Hisense H65 for $399.99. Both of these 4K displays come with a host of excellent smart TV features and full HDR support too, so you're getting plenty of modern appointments as well as a great picture and a reasonable price tag to match.

And, finally, we round out our list of today's TV deals with a couple of more premium choices for those serious about their displays. Both the Sony X800H series ($449.99) and Samsung's Q60T series ($599.99) are on sale today, which are both great upper mid-range choices for those who are serious about their picture quality.
